name: Mailchimp -> ClickUp
description: Mailchimp is one of the most popular email marketing tools as it allows you to collect emails, build email lists and setup autoresponders. Even though email marketing can potentially land you some clients in the long run by providing value, a quicker way to close some deals is by storing your lead information in a ClickUp list and reaching out to your prospects on a one to one basis. Identify their problems, provide solutions and make some sales!!!
